T02D2059:155a-1: ha ri ti kunda la dha ra ni s'a dha nam /
T02D2059:155a-3: 'phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2059:155a-6: 'phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma zhes bya ba aa
T02D2059:155a-7: pa tsha ra'i sgrub thabs la gong bzhin du rtags
T02D2059:155a-9: ri'i rtse mor nyi ma re la khri phrag re
T02D2059:155a-10: bzlas la nya'i nub mo mtshan phyed kyi dus su
T02D2059:155a-12: de nas 'dis nor 'bum phrag re ster ro //
T02D2059:155a-13: rgyab tu khur nas gling bzhi ston par byed do //
T02D2059:155a-14: bcud la sogs pa ster ro //
